name: Paprika Trainer
summary:
You play as a inmate being kept in the WOOHP asylum for the criminally insane. When suddenly the power goes out, all the villains escape and turn Beverly Hills into a warzone. It's up to you and the three spies to go undercover and take back the city!

In this game you go on missions, capture gang leaders and keep your spies safe by preforming more and more slutty actions. While playing you will encounter an engrossing, comedic story, a fully implemented mission mini-game, lots of supporting characters and of course many many lewd scenes. Most of which are fully animated and voice acted!
